channel.title: When talking to npc bank opens
channel.description: When ever i talk to a npc wich does not have a current, well, job i would say, the bank opens =\ Is there a way to stop this, it is realy anoying[br][size=1]Posted on: January 16, 2007, 10:54:34 AM[/size][hr]Ugh cant even add new shops now, they just open up the bank =\ I did not have this problem untill yesterday, but i did not add/ delete anything =\ If you need to see yourself before you can help come to my server it is on

item.title: When talking to npc bank opens
item.dc:creator: @SirPali SirPali
item.description:
@SirPali wrote:

Nope, still there the bug
I noticed something though, in the bank screen it says The Bank of RuneScape while i changed it, also you cant put stuff on it, because you cant see your inventory and you cant take stuff of[br][size=1]Posted on: January 16, 2007, 01:43:17 PM[/size][hr]Muahaha =] Thanks for the advice of removing the guys, i just deleted ALL bankers from the entire game, now the bug is gone.
Hurray for Blitz_9100

Read full topic
